nodes.text: R2-C4, also known as C4, was a New Republic R-series astromech droid that operated approximately thirty years after the Battle of Endor. It operated as navigator and copilot in Kazuda Xiono's T-85 X-wing fighter when they faced the First Order Major Elrik Vonreg's TIE Interceptor.
Later on, when they docked with a Resistance CR90 corvette, R2-C4 boarded the vessel along with Xiono.
